information.headerTextRightSide: For more information, or to join CFUW/Saskatoon Inc., please contact the following:
information.address: CFUW Saskatoon Inc., P.O. Box 7405, Saskatoon, SK. S7K 4J3
information.moreInfo: General Meetings are held the first Monday of the Month at 7:30 p.m. at the W.A. Edwards Family Centre, 333 Fourth Avenue North, Saskatoon. Visitors are welcome. Annual membership fees are $80.00
